title: Go And Give Items To Noteblock
description: [EXPERIMENTAL BEHAVIOR] The entity will attempt to toss the items from its inventory to a nearby recently played noteblock.

listen_time.title: Listen Time
listen_time.description: Sets the time an entity should continue delivering items to a noteblock after hearing it.

on_item_throw.title: On Item Throw
on_item_throw.description: Event(s) to run when this mob throws items.

reach_block_distance.title: Reach Block Distance
reach_block_distance.description: Sets the desired distance to be reached before throwing the items towards the block.

run_speed.title: Run Speed
run_speed.description: Sets the entity's speed when running toward the block.

throw_sound.title: Throw Sound
throw_sound.description: Sound to play when this mob throws an item.

vertical_throw_mul.title: Vertical Throw Mul
vertical_throw_mul.description: Sets the vertical throw multiplier that is applied on top of the throw force in the vertical direction.
